title: Managing a play
creator_credit: International Film Bureau, Robert Edmonds, Betty Edmonds and Maurice Gnesin
brief_description: Importance of publicity and ticket management for successful play production shown in detailed study of publicity director and manager’s responsibilities. Film includes preparations of newspaper advertisements, releases, posters and handbills as well as advance ticket selling, box-office procedures and ticket counting.
